dc_title_s: Real Estate Boundary: Linn County, Iowa
dc_description_s: This feature layer contains Linn County real estate boundary lines. This information is maintained by the Real Estate department within the Auditor's Office. See below for feature layer details.Feature Layer DetailsUpdate Frequency: As neededFeature Class Coordinate System: NAD 1983 (2011) Iowa North State Plane (wkid: 6463)Max Visibility Scale: NoneMin Visibility Scale: 1:18,056Max Features Returned: 10,000Additional ResourcesVisit Linn County, Iowa on the web.Visit Linn County, Iowa GIS on the web.Visit the Linn County, Iowa GIS portal. This site is updated as needed to reflect maps and apps of interest from various departments.Contact InformationQuestions  Contact the GIS Division by phone at 319.892.5250 or by email.
